quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The capacity to learn is a gift; the ability to learn is a skill; the willingness to learn is a choice.
author: Brian Herbert

quote: Technology is best when it brings people together. The future of technology is not about the technology itself, but about how it enables human connection.
author: Matt Mullenweg
